meanings.definition: Lobelines: a group of alkaloids found in plants of the genus Lobelia, known for their pharmacological effects on the respiratory system.
meanings.sent1: The lobelines in Lobelia plants have beneficial effects on breathing.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes use lobelines to help patients with respiratory issues.
meanings.sent3: The lobelines in Lobelia are like tiny helpers for your lungs.
meanings.sent4: Herbalists often refer to lobelines as the breath of nature.
meanings.sent5: The lobelines work like magic to clear the airways and improve breathing.
